title: Protests Begin in Daraa
description: Major unrest begins triggered by the arrest of teenagers for anti-government graffiti; security forces open fire on protesters.

title: Siege of Daraa
description: The Syrian Army initiates a large-scale military attack on Daraa with tanks, marking the start of military crackdowns.

title: Fighting in Jisr al-Shughur
description: Heavy fighting breaks out; unverified reports claim security forces defected after refusing to fire on civilians.

title: Formation of FSA
description: Defected officers announce the formation of the Free Syrian Army (FSA) to protect protesters and remove the government.

title: Arab League Suspension
description: The Arab League suspends Syria's membership due to the government's crackdown on protesters.

title: Damascus Bombings
description: Two coordinated suicide car bombs in Damascus kill 44 people, marking an escalation in insurgent tactics.

title: UN Resolution Vetoed
description: Russia and China veto a UN Security Council draft resolution supporting the Arab League peace plan.

title: UN-Mediated Ceasefire
description: A UN-mediated ceasefire begins but quickly fails as violence continues on both sides.

title: Houla Massacre
description: 108 people are summarily executed in Houla, leading to the collapse of the UN ceasefire attempts.

title: Al-Qubeir Massacre
description: 78 civilians are killed in Al-Qubeir; UN observers are blocked from investigating the site immediately.

title: Turkish Jet Shot Down
description: Syrian forces shoot down a Turkish F-4 fighter jet, increasing tensions between the two nations.

title: ICRC Declares Civil War
description: The International Committee of the Red Cross officially declares the Syrian conflict a civil war.

title: Damascus Bombing
description: A suicide bomb hits the National Security HQ in Damascus, killing the Defense Minister and other top officials.

title: Battle of Aleppo Begins
description: Rebels launch a major offensive to capture Aleppo, shifting focus to the country's commercial hub.

title: Rebels Seize Base 46
description: Rebels capture a major army base in Aleppo province, seizing tanks and heavy weapons.

title: Capture of Taftanaz Airbase
description: Islamist groups, including al-Nusra, take control of the strategic Taftanaz airbase in Idlib.

title: Rebels Capture Tabqa Dam
description: Islamist rebels capture the town of Al-Thawrah and the nearby Tabqa Dam, Syria's largest.

title: Fall of Raqqa
description: Rebels capture Raqqa, making it the first provincial capital to fall entirely out of government control.

title: Bayda and Baniyas Massacres
description: Reports emerge of massacres by government forces in Bayda and Baniyas, killing over 100 people.

title: Battle of al-Qusayr
description: Government forces and Hezbollah retake the strategic town of al-Qusayr near the Lebanese border.

title: Ghouta Chemical Attack
description: Sarin gas attack in the Ghouta suburbs of Damascus kills hundreds; brings threat of US intervention.

title: ISIS Overruns Azaz
description: ISIS seizes the border town of Azaz from FSA forces, marking increased infighting among rebels.

title: Rebel Offensive Against ISIS
description: A coalition of rebel groups launches an offensive to expel ISIS from Aleppo and Idlib.

title: ISIS Takes Raqqa
description: ISIS retakes Raqqa from other rebel groups, establishing it as their stronghold.

title: Nusra Captures Shadadeh
description: Al-Nusra Front fighters seize the town of Shadadeh in Al-Hasakah near the Iraqi border.

title: Fall of Yabrud
description: Government forces and Hezbollah capture the rebel stronghold of Yabrud near Lebanon.

title: Presidential Election
description: Syria holds presidential elections in government areas; Assad wins 88.7% amidst international criticism.

title: Caliphate Declared
description: ISIS announces the establishment of a caliphate and changes its name to the 'Islamic State'.

title: Execution of James Foley
description: ISIS executes American journalist James Foley in retaliation for US operations.

title: Fall of Tabqa Airbase
description: ISIS seizes Tabqa airbase, the government's last foothold in Raqqa province.

title: US Coalition Intervention
description: The US and Arab allies begin airstrikes against ISIS targets in Raqqa and elsewhere.

title: Liberation of Kobani
description: Kurdish YPG forces, backed by US airstrikes, drive ISIS out of Kobani after a long siege.

title: Rebels Capture Idlib
description: The Army of Conquest coalition captures Idlib city, cementing opposition control in the northwest.

title: Capture of Jisr al-Shughur
description: The Army of Conquest captures the strategic city of Jisr al-Shughur.

title: ISIS Captures Palmyra
description: ISIS takes control of the ancient city of Palmyra after days of fighting.

title: Russian Intervention
description: Russia begins air strikes in support of the Assad government, shifting the war's balance.

title: Turkey Shoots Down Russian Jet
description: Turkey shoots down a Russian warplane near the Syrian border, causing a diplomatic crisis.

title: UN Resolution 2254
description: The UN Security Council adopts a resolution endorsing a road map for a peace process.

title: Cessation of Hostilities
description: A US-Russia brokered partial ceasefire comes into effect.

title: Recapture of Palmyra
description: Government forces, with Russian support, retake Palmyra from ISIS.

title: SDF Captures Manbij
description: The Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) fully capture the city of Manbij from ISIS.

title: Operation Euphrates Shield
description: Turkey launches a military incursion into northern Syria to push back ISIS and Kurdish forces.

title: Fall of Aleppo
description: Government forces recapture all rebel-held parts of Aleppo, ending a 4-year battle.

title: Capture of Wadi Barada
description: Government forces capture the Wadi Barada valley, restoring Damascus water supplies.

title: Khan Shaykhun Chemical Attack
description: A chemical attack on Khan Shaykhun kills dozens, prompting US missile strikes.

title: Shayrat Missile Strike
description: The US launches Tomahawk missiles at Shayrat Airbase in response to the chemical attack.

title: De-escalation Zones Agreement
description: Russia, Iran, and Turkey sign an agreement to create four 'de-escalation zones'.

title: Deir ez-Zor Siege Broken
description: Government forces break the three-year ISIS siege of Deir ez-Zor city.

title: Liberation of Raqqa
description: SDF forces announce full control of Raqqa after months of fighting ISIS.

title: Capture of Abu Kamal
description: Government forces and allies capture Abu Kamal, ending ISIS's hold on major urban areas.

title: Russia Declares ISIS Defeated
description: Russia declares Syria 'completely liberated' from ISIS; Putin orders partial withdrawal.

title: Operation Olive Branch
description: Turkey begins a cross-border operation against Kurdish forces in Afrin.

title: Israel-Iran Aerial Clash
description: Syria shoots down an Israeli F-16 after Israel strikes Iranian targets; major escalation.

title: Fall of Afrin
description: Turkish forces and allies capture Afrin city from Kurdish YPG forces.

title: Douma Chemical Attack
description: A chemical attack in Douma kills 70 people; triggers Western missile strikes.

title: Western Missile Strikes
description: US, UK, and France launch strikes on government targets in response to the Douma attack.

title: Capture of Nasib Crossing
description: Government forces capture the Nasib Border Crossing with Jordan during the Southern Syria offensive.

title: Government Retakes Daraa
description: Government forces fully retake Daraa and Quneitra provinces, ending the rebellion in the south.

title: Idlib Buffer Zone Agreement
description: Russia and Turkey agree to create a demilitarized buffer zone in Idlib to avert a government offensive.

title: US Troop Withdrawal Announcement
description: President Trump announces the withdrawal of all US troops from Syria.

title: Manbij Bombing
description: An ISIS suicide bomber kills US service personnel and others in Manbij.

title: Battle of Baghuz Fawqani
description: SDF declares the final territorial defeat of ISIS in Syria after capturing Baghuz.

title: Operation Peace Spring
description: Turkey launches an offensive into NE Syria following US troop pullback.

title: SDF-Government Deal
description: Kurdish-led SDF reaches a deal with the Syrian government to deter the Turkish offensive.

title: Sochi Agreement (2019)
description: Russia and Turkey agree to a new buffer zone, pushing YPG forces back from the border.

title: Death of Baghdadi
description: ISIS leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi dies during a US raid in Idlib province.

title: Capture of Ma'arrat al-Nu'man
description: Syrian Army captures the strategic city of Ma'arrat al-Nu'man in Idlib.

title: Balyun Airstrikes
description: Airstrikes kill 34 Turkish soldiers in Idlib, triggering Operation Spring Shield.

title: Idlib Ceasefire
description: Russia and Turkey sign a ceasefire deal, halting the government offensive in Idlib.

title: PM Khamis Dismissed
description: President Assad dismisses Prime Minister Imad Khamis amid economic crisis and protests.

title: Caesar Act Sanctions
description: US Caesar Act sanctions come into effect, deepening Syria's economic crisis.
